titles.title: Renewable and Hydroelectric Energy for Alaska's Tomorrow Act (the Renewable HEAT Act)
To authorize the Department of Energy to make grants to carry out renewable energy projects, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E2591-2592)
Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Air Quality.

bill.summary:
12/17/2007--Introduced.
Renewable and Hydroelectric Energy for Alaska's Tomorrow Act (the Renewable HEAT Act) - Instructs the Secretary of Energy to make grants to implement renewable energy projects that generate electricity from solar, wind, geothermal, or ocean energy, or biomass, landfill gas, or Alaska small hydroelectric power.
